reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 161/08: REMUNERATION OF DEPUTY JUDGES
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 161/08: REMUNERATION OF DEPUTY JUDGES

content.content: 1. A deputy judge is entitled to be paid on a per diem basis at the following rate, for each day on which he or she is entitled to remuneration: 1.  For a day on or after January 1, 2019 and before January 1, 2020, a daily rate of $735. 2.  For a day on or after January 1, 2020 and before January 1, 2021, a daily rate of $742. 3.  For a day on or after January 1, 2021 and before December 31, 2021, a daily rate of $749. 4.  For a day on or after December 31, 2021, a daily rate of $788. O. Reg. 126/15, s. 1; O. Reg. 352/18, s. 1; O. Reg. 746/20, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. A deputy judge is entitled to be paid on a per diem basis at the following rate, for each day on which he or she is entitled to remuneration:

1.  For a day on or after January 1, 2019 and before January 1, 2020, a daily rate of $735.

2.  For a day on or after January 1, 2020 and before January 1, 2021, a daily rate of $742.

3.  For a day on or after January 1, 2021 and before December 31, 2021, a daily rate of $749.

4.  For a day on or after December 31, 2021, a daily rate of $788. O. Reg. 126/15, s. 1; O. Reg. 352/18, s. 1; O. Reg. 746/20, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 161/08, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 161/08, s. 2.
